author: Andrew
content:
Hi Andreas,
I own the same lens since about 3 weeks and I'm sure you will be very happy with it. I've postet a short review with my findings here: http://lensblues.com/articles/gear-reviews/olympus-m-zuiko-ed-12-40mm-f2-8-review/.
It would be great if you could also give a short resume of your experience with the lens in some days on your blog. I'm really courious about the opinion of someone who's using mainly primary lenses ðŸ˜‰

Best regards and have a nice day,
Andrew

Btw: the 'Night Vision'-shot from monday is very nice - great colors - luck was with you ðŸ˜‰
